long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browser Notes is a student-friendly Chrome extension designed to streamline the note-taking process. With a clean and intuitive interface, it allows users to capture, manage, and organize text notes and images directly within the browser. Whether you're saving quick thoughts, referencing images, or compiling materials for an assignment, Browser Notes makes it easy to keep everything in one place.

Key Features:

Effortless Note Management: Select any text on a webpage and press the 'S' key to instantly save it as a note.

Image Integration: Save any image you encounter online directly into your notes via the right-click context menu.

PDF Export: Seamlessly generate PDFs from your notes and images, perfect for sharing or reviewing offline.

One-Click Cleanup: With a simple keyboard shortcut (Alt+Shift+N), clear all saved notes and images in seconds.

User-Friendly Design: The extension includes easy-to-recognize icons, making it accessible from your browser toolbar and extension settings.

Browser Notes transforms how students manage their learning materials, keeping note-taking fast, efficient, and organized.
